name: Horse and Go Seek
description:
Get ready to gallop through scenic locations with your majestic horse to find all the hidden animals!



Begin your journey as an adventurous horse on a quest to explore the world, and find some animal friends along the way.
Travel through 8 different locales and 29 levels to save the hidden wildlife.
Unlock 11 unique horses and choose over 56 different hair colors to style your horse.
Seek out the mysterious spirits who will grant your horse mystical powers.
Relax and take your time experiencing each location, or challenge yourself to to speed run the levels; it's up to you!

Places to Visit

  • Pleasant Isle - a small peaceful island, with easier to find animals
  • Lazy River - trot along rocky lowlands with a river running through it
  • Desert Canyon - gallop through desert canyon terraces under the hot sun
  • Dark Woods - wander through thick fog in this shrouded forest
  • Tranquil Taiga - explore the serene landscape of the northern mountains
  • Tropical Islands - paddle between the palm tree islands to find all the animals
  • Horizon Highlands - experience evening around the lakes in the highlands
  • ??? - discover the bonus world and soar to victory

Animals to Find

  • Beagles
  • Cats
  • Camels
  • Bears
  • Penguins
  • Rabbits
  • Turtles
  • Plus many more!
